project.title: Cabin Build Wizard (Seed)
project.wizard_notes: Initial framework seed generated from provided cabin spreadsheets. Adjust for house-specific plan.

steps.title: Obtain municipal and state permits
steps.description: Seeded from cabin timeline and related planning sheets; refine with house-specific blueprint inputs.

steps.title: Begin site work and excavation
steps.description: Seeded from cabin timeline and related planning sheets; refine with house-specific blueprint inputs.

steps.title: Purchase: Meter Base
steps.description: Recommended: Eaton 200A 1-Gang Ringless Overhead/Underground Meter Socket (UTRS213CE) | Link: https://www.lowes.com/pd/Eaton-200-Amp-1-Gang-Ringless-Overhead-Underground-Meter-Socket/3776009

steps.title: Purchase: Power line
steps.description: Recommended: Utility service drop / trenching / connection (get quote from AEMC/utility + electrician) | Details: Call AEMC and get pricing after meter base is installed & electrical inspected

steps.title: Purchase: Electrical (finish)
steps.description: Recommended: Labor/consumables allowance (wire nuts, staples, etc.)

steps.title: Purchase: Outdoor corner lights and cameras
steps.description: Recommended: Security camera + floodlight kit (choose per coverage plan) | Link: https://a.co/d/eFoRJ4a

steps.title: Purchase: Porch light
steps.description: Recommended: Outdoor pendant/lantern fixture (damp rated) | Link: https://www.amazon.com/Wellmet-Farmhouse-Chandelier-Dining-Sputnik/dp/B08RS7L3N1/ref=sr_1_37?crid=8T897CH4I6YT&dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.D2tztzQi8vGclPgT0yPlj0ho_yLQ2pcViCNYybM-07AMV53j2iNSOgi8JZmcoZ-i6hYFbnyDBs7JZSMS0uIksFf22200tiZaNjouQ3uCxZpPGt3luLoiTITJ8kuDCehQMIfLNqqI5bw__rrzc243V6VLjTILPIMfOH53rMHB89x0jS2XCqJeWAd0xF168XLtcJmHJsvUfa6xG8uM9nPaf3BMdaxXFNIRQI9l7Z25y6y6yNCw9hCE9jexoMzWVjT890KIUbM4RaaMa2F9F2alQFHPf3ryXUBT8Mb2FcbIJvw.ow2cKt_EsOVMJFysBDFmkj22XL0ZwYBLAB9QGokX0i8&dib_tag=se&keywords=outdoor%2Bchandelier%2Bfor%2Bporch&qid=1710378923&sprefix=outdoor%2Bchandelier%2Caps%2C119&sr=8-37&th=1

steps.title: Purchase: Outdoor sconce lights
steps.description: Recommended: Outdoor wall sconces (wet rated) – pick style set | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/KICHLER-Seaside-1-Light-Olde-Bronze-Outdoor-Hardwired-Barn-Sconce-with-No-Bulbs-Included-1-Pack-9022OZ/312764068

steps.title: Purchase: Electrical Panel - Breakers
steps.description: Recommended: Square D QO 20A single-pole breakers (12-pack) (adjust mix per circuit schedule) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Square-D-QO-20-Amp-Single-Pole-Circuit-Breaker-12-pack-QO120CP12/313219912

steps.title: Purchase: Electrical switches
steps.description: Recommended: Leviton Decora 15A single-pole rocker switches (10-pack) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Leviton-Decora-15-Amp-Single-Pole-Rocker-AC-Quiet-Light-Switch-White-10-Pack-M32-05601-2WM/202204204

steps.title: Purchase: Electrical receptacles
steps.description: Recommended: Leviton Decora 15A tamper-resistant duplex outlets (10-pack) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Leviton-Decora-15-Amp-125-V-Tamper-Resistant-Duplex-Outlet-Receptacle-White-10-Pack-T5325-WMP-M22-T5325-WMP/100684055

steps.title: Purchase: Electrical covers
steps.description: Recommended: Leviton 1-gang Decora/Rocker midway wall plates (10-pack) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Leviton-1-Gang-White-Decora-Rocker-Nylon-Midway-Midsize-Wall-Plate-10-Pack-0PJ26-0WM-M52-0PJ26-0WM/100356780

steps.title: Purchase: Blinds - electrical
steps.description: Recommended: Motorized blinds/shades (custom sizing; price varies by window count/size)

steps.title: Purchase: Air Conditioner / Heater
steps.description: Recommended: MRCOOL DIY 5th Gen 18,000 BTU mini-split heat pump (25 ft install kit) | Link: https://www.lowes.com/pd/MRCOOL-DIY-5TH-Gen-18-000-BTU-22-5-SEER2-Energy-Star-Ductless-Mini-Split-AC-and-Heat-Pump-with-25ft-Install-Kit-230V/5015826317

steps.title: Purchase: Environment Control Unit
steps.description: Recommended: ERV/HRV ventilation unit (size per sq ft) – price varies

steps.title: Purchase: Humidifier
steps.description: Recommended: Whole-home humidifier (model depends on HVAC type) – price varies

steps.title: Purchase: Insulation
steps.description: Recommended: Owens Corning / Rockwool batts + attic insulation (price per bundle/bag)

steps.title: Purchase: Sheetrock
steps.description: Recommended: 1/2-in drywall 4x8 sheets + mud/tape/screws (price per sheet)

steps.title: Purchase: Bathroom tile / Glass shower
steps.description: Recommended: Tile + Schluter waterproofing + shower glass (highly design-dependent)

steps.title: Purchase: Flooring
steps.description: Recommended: LVP flooring (wear layer 20 mil recommended for durability)

steps.title: Purchase: Canned Lights
steps.description: Recommended: Utilitech 6-in canless LED downlight, 12-pack | Link: https://www.lowes.com/pd/Utilitech-White-6-in-650-Lumen-Switchable-White-Round-Dimmable-LED-Canless-Recessed-Downlight-12-Pack/5014923741

steps.title: Purchase: Bathroom fixtures
steps.description: Recommended: Moen Adler bathroom faucet (single) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/MOEN-Adler-4-in-Centerset-Single-Handle-Low-Arc-Bathroom-Faucet-in-Chrome-WS84503/206884204

steps.title: Purchase: Bathroom vanity cabinet
steps.description: Recommended: 24–36 in vanity cabinet (choose width) – price varies

steps.title: Purchase: Bathroom sink
steps.description: Recommended: Cultured marble / undermount vanity top (size/style varies)

steps.title: Purchase: Toilet
steps.description: Recommended: American Standard Cadet 3 chair-height elongated toilet (seat included) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/American-Standard-Cadet-3-Flo-Wise-2-Piece-1-28-GPF-Single-Flush-Chair-Height-Elongated-Toilet-with-Skirted-Bowl-in-White-Seat-Included-2989813-020/205567492

steps.title: Purchase: Shower heads
steps.description: Recommended: Delta In2ition shower head + handheld combo (Chrome) | Link: https://www.lowes.com/pd/Delta-In2ition-Chrome-4-Spray-Dual-Shower-Head/1000342189

steps.title: Purchase: Shower handle
steps.description: Recommended: Shower valve + trim (match your chosen brand/finish) – price varies

steps.title: Purchase: Bathroom heater
steps.description: Recommended: Broan-NuTone 110 CFM bath fan with light + 1500W heater (765H110L) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Broan-NuTone-110-CFM-Ceiling-Bathroom-Exhaust-Fan-with-Light-and-1500-Watt-Heater-765H110L/307639698

steps.title: Purchase: Bathroom vanity light
steps.description: Recommended: Vanity light (choose style/finish) – price varies

steps.title: Purchase: Bathroom mirror
steps.description: Recommended: Framed vanity mirror (size/style varies)

steps.title: Purchase: Kitchen cabinets
steps.description: Recommended: Hampton Bay in-stock cabinets (build full layout) – example 30" base cabinet | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Hampton-Bay-Hampton-30-in-W-x-24-in-D-x-34-5-in-H-Assembled-Base-Cabinet-in-Satin-White-KB30-SW/100545475

steps.title: Purchase: Dishwasher
steps.description: Recommended: Bosch 100 Series dishwasher (48 dBA, stainless option) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/b/Appliances-Dishwashers/Bosch/Bosch-100-Series/N-5yc1vZc3poZ9uZ1z1yo5k

steps.title: Purchase: Stove
steps.description: Recommended: GE 30" 5-burner element freestanding electric range (GRF500PVSS) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/GE-30-in-5-Burner-Element-Free-Standing-Electric-Range-in-Stainless-Steel-with-Crisp-Mode-GRF500PVSS/328284779

steps.title: Purchase: Refrigerator
steps.description: Recommended: Frigidaire 18.3 cu ft top-freezer refrigerator, stainless (FFTR1835VS) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Frigidaire-30-in-18-3-cu-ft-Garage-Ready-Top-Freezer-Refrigerator-in-Stainless-Steel-FFTR1835VS/311743486

steps.title: Purchase: Kitchen sink
steps.description: Recommended: KRAUS Loften 33" workstation sink + pull-down faucet bundle | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/KRAUS-Loften-33-in-Drop-In-Undermount-Single-Bowl-18-Gauge-Stainless-Steel-Kitchen-Sink-with-Pull-Down-Faucet-KCH-1000-H/326001240

steps.title: Purchase: Kitchen sink fixtures
steps.description: Recommended: Included with sink bundle above or choose separate faucet (match finish)

steps.title: Purchase: Garbage disposal
steps.description: Recommended: InSinkErator Badger 5 (1/2 HP) continuous feed | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/InSinkErator-Badger-5-1-2-HP-Continuous-Feed-Kitchen-Garbage-Disposal-Badger-Series-79883-ISE/100091168

steps.title: Purchase: Trash compactor
steps.description: Recommended: Under-counter trash compactor (niche; verify cabinet opening + dedicated circuit)

steps.title: Purchase: Kitchen pendant lights
steps.description: Recommended: Pendant lights (choose style; damp rated if near sink)

steps.title: Purchase: Dining light
steps.description: Recommended: Dining chandelier/fixture (choose style)

steps.title: Purchase: Dining table
steps.description: Recommended: Dining table (solid wood preferred)

steps.title: Purchase: Television mount
steps.description: Recommended: Full-motion TV wall mount (stud-rated)

steps.title: Purchase: Bedroom ceiling fan
steps.description: Recommended: 52" ceiling fan w/ LED + remote (damp rated if needed)

steps.title: Purchase: Sconce lights for each side of bed
steps.description: Recommended: Hardwired wall sconces (set of 2)

steps.title: Purchase: Attic ladder
steps.description: Recommended: Louisville Ladder insulated aluminum attic ladder, 22.5" x 54" (375 lb) | Link: https://www.homedepot.com/p/Louisville-Ladder-Energy-Efficient-7-ft-8-in-to-10-ft-3-in-22-5-in-x-54-in-Insulated-Aluminum-Attic-Ladder-375-lbs-Load-Capacity-AH2240MG-R5/326588158

steps.title: Purchase: Closet organizer
steps.description: Recommended: Closet system (wire or laminate; adjust per closet width)

steps.title: Purchase: Closet shelves
steps.description: Recommended: Shelf boards/brackets or closet kits

steps.title: Purchase: Overages
steps.description: Recommended: Contingency (10–15% recommended) | Details: Add 20%
